definitions.definition: Any plant of the genus Digitalis ( herbaceous plants of the Plantaginaceae family , including the foxglove , Digitalis purpurea ).
A medical extract of Digitalis purpurea prescribed for heart failure etc.

main_definition: Any plant of the genus Digitalis ( herbaceous plants of the Plantaginaceae family , including the foxglove , Digitalis purpurea ).
secondary_definitions: ( medicine ) A medical extract of Digitalis purpurea prescribed for heart failure etc.
